p: Stimulatory effects of ethanol extract of A. cepa (0.8–409.6 μg/mL) on lymphocyte response to a mitogen and IL-2 and IFN-γ gene expressions in white leghorn chickens, were evaluated (Hanieh et al. 2012). Oral administration of aqueous extract of A. cepa (250, 500 and 750 mg/kg) significantly increased CD4 cells in Wistar rats, indicating immunostimulatory potential of A. cepa (Mirabeau and Samson 2012).
